data.name: BuildCreationWindow_InsertBuildName
data.value: Insert the build name. The ship name is automatically included.

data.name: IncomingFireAlertDesc
data.value: Minimum range for the warning to appear

data.name: ShipSelectionWindow_NoResultsFound
data.value: No ships matching the filtering criteria found

data.name: MessageBox_DuplicateShip
data.value: has already been added with that shell

data.name: FiringAngleWindow_AngleExplanation
data.value: The reference angle used start at 0° on the front (top of the image) and goes in a clockwise direction

data.name: FiringAngleWindow_Disclaimer
data.value: Some turret orientation is wrong. The data from WG doesn't include it, so we use a workaround that work for most cases. If you find a case of a turret orientation and/or angle being wrong, report it on Github or by joining the Discord server below.

data.name: StartMenu_BuildLoadingError
data.value: Error during the loading of the build

data.name: ShipStats_AimPenaltyPlanes
data.value: Drop area change rate while manoeuvring

data.name: SettingsWindow_InvalidCustomPath
data.value: The selected custom data path is not valid.

data.name: DispersionGraphWindow_SelectShellDesc
data.value: has more than one shell. Select the one you want the ballistic of. Assuming the same caliber, the shell order below is HE->SAP->AP.

data.name: SettingsWindow_TelemetryEnabled
data.value: Send basic telemetry data (current app version)

data.name: DispersionGraphWindow_NoRange
data.value: THIS SHIP CAN'T REACH THE SELECTED AIMING RANGE

data.name: DispersionGraphWindow_DispPlotDescription
ShipStats_BlastExplanation
data.value: If "module blast protection" + "armament blast penetration" > 0 The module can be incapacitated. If "module blast protection" + "armament blast penetration" <= 0 The module can not be incapacitated.

data.name: Settingswindow_LanguageChanged
data.value: A restart of the application is required for the language-change to take effect. Not restarting can result in unexpected behaviour.

data.name: SettingsWindow_TranslationCredits
data.value: Thanks to the following community members for helping with the translation of this project. Below, all members with at least 10 contributions are mentioned.

data.name: SettingsWindow_OpenExplorerAfterImageSave
data.value: Open explorer when saving a build image

data.name: BuildCreationWindow_IncludeSignals
data.value: Include signals and consumables in image

data.name: SettingsWindow_BuildImagePathInvalid
data.value: The selected custom build image path is invalid.

data.name: CaptainSkillSelector_SkillTalentDescription
data.value: With the following slider and toggles, you can enable or disable certain conditional skill effects. You can also select how many times to trigger the talent effect, if possible. Note that not all skill/talents will have an effect on the ship statistics.

data.name: MessageBox_LoadingError
data.value: There was an error during the loading of the data. This may be due to the data format not being compatible with an older version of the app or corrupted data. If you are not on the latest version, wait until you get a prompt about restarting the app to update, or update manually if you disabled automatic updates. If you are on the latest version, use the setting window to clean all the stored application data to solve data corruption issues.

data.name: ShipStats_TrueReloadTooltip
data.value: The server updates only every 0.142857142857 seconds. This means that reloads falling between multiples of this number will be moved to the tick after. The value represented here shows the true reload you are getting, that can be different than the theoretical reload above.

data.name: Validation_BuildName
data.value: The build name contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, whitespace, hyphens and underscores are allowed.

data.name: DataUpdate_ErrorDescription
data.value: There has been an error during the data update. This may cause data to be invalid or not up to date. To try again, restart the application. For more information, check the application log.

data.name: NotificationService_ErrorMessage
data.value: There was an error during the app update. Check the log file for more details.

data.name: NotificationService_UpdateCompleted
data.value: The app has been updated in the background. A restart is required to apply the update. Click to restart.

data.name: UpdateMessageBox_Description
data.value: The app has been updated, do you want to restart to apply the changes?

data.name: ShipStats_SplashExplanation
data.value: These parameters only affect submarines. They do not have any effect on surface ships.

data.name: Consumable_RightClickToggle
data.value: Right-click an icon to toggle effects

data.name: WebApp_AmmoExpanderSetting
data.value: Open Shells, Torps and Planes expanders by default

data.name: Consumable_HoldToggle
data.value: Hold an icon to toggle effects

data.name: WebApp_ArtilleryAngleExplanation
data.value: The 0° angle is at the top. Positive is clockwise, negative is counter clockwise. The red angles are the dead zones of the armament (can rotate to but not shoot).

data.name: WebApp_ExpanderSetting
data.value: Open all main expander by default

data.name: WebApp_SecondariesAndAAExpanderSetting
data.value: Open all secondaries, plane weapons and AA expanders by default

data.name: Build_EnterBuildName
data.value: Please enter a build name. The ship name will be automatically displayed at the end.

data.name: AccelerationChart_ExplanationText
data.value: After selecting a ship, you have the option to select the 3 gears that will be used in the chart. The chart will go in the order Initial gear --> Middle gear --> Final Gear, switching to the next one only after reaching the maximum speed of the current gear. Setting two gear to the same value will merge them into one. You can use the Change builds button to manage the builds of single ships. You can also add a ship multiple times, in case you want to compare different builds.

data.name: ShipStats_InactivityDelay
data.value: Time of inactivity before progress loss

data.name: BuildImageSettingsDialog_TwoColumnsTooltip
data.value: Widens the image layout by splitting elements into 2 side by side columns (captain skills and signals will not be concealable).

data.name: ShipComparison_UseUpgradedModules
data.value: Use upgraded modules if no build

data.name: SettingsWindow_LocalStorageWarning
data.value: Builds are saved in your browser local storage. Operations such as clearing the browser cache will very likely delete all the data stored in the local storage. We highly recommend you to export your builds periodically or at least before performing such operations.

data.name: ShipStats_KruppExplanation
data.value: It's a constant used to tweak projectile's penetration. Represents how sturdy the projectile is. The higher the value the higher the penetration is.

data.name: ShipStats_ApPenetrationFormula
data.value:
K = projectile's krupp M = projectile's mass [kg] S = projectile's impact speed [m/s] C = projectile's caliber [m]
Penetration [mm] = K * (M * S^2)^0.69 * C^(-1.07) * 0.0000001
Reverse engineered by TTaro_

data.name: ShipStats_DcDetonationDepthExplanation
data.value: The depth of submarines shown in game is expressed as "ship_meter". Subs can dive 60[ship_m] = 120[m].
